question: For the last 5 months I  have had chronic pain in my lower back. At times it radiates down my legs. I am a 59 year old male with type 2 diabetes, obese, hypertension, and a history of high cholestorol. The x-ray of my back findings were: Endplate sclerosis and spur formation is seen. There is a narrowing of L5/S1 disc. No fractures.I know I must lose weight, but what are the possible future problems?  My sister has stenosis in her back and can barely walk.  Is there a relationship?
title: X-Ray Lumbar Spine
